rounds.comments: (Alex: They stand for north, east, west or south.)

clues.text: Of north, east, west, or south, the one not part of a U.S. state's name

rounds.text: It was feared this word caused panic, but in 1950 the U.S. Weather Bureau ended a ban on it in forecasts, saying prediction wasn't impossible
